turns.query: Calculate both the win probability and the average number of rolls for a dice game using the simulation parameters (number of games and roll limit) provided in the variables. The game uses 3 dice. A player loses on a total of 3, 4, 5, 16, 17, or 18. They win on 7 or 11. Any other initial roll becomes a 'point'. On subsequent rolls, the player wins by rolling the same 'point' number again or by rolling a 7 or 11.
What is the new win probability if the game rules are modified to make an initial roll of 8 or 9 an immediate loss? Please calculate this by running a new simulation using the same parameters.
